channel.title: Christmas on mostlymaths.net
channel.description: Recent content in Christmas on mostlymaths.net

item.title: 2018: Year in Review
item.description: The year has ended, what has been going on?

item.title: 2017: Year in Review
item.description: I am trying to make these posts a tradition (even if a few days late). I thought 2016 had been a really weird and fun year, but 2017 has beaten it easily. And I only hope 2018 will be even better in every way. For the record, when I say we, it means Laia and me unless explicitly changed.

item.title: Evolutionary approximation of a Christmas postcard
item.description: If you liked it, leave a comment, digg, stumble or whatever you feel like doing Stochastic hill-climbing algorithm to approximate a picture by triangles (algorithm and source code). This image contains 48 images out of 1000, from iterating for 11000 generations the evolution code. The source image is the last square in the tile set. Bon Nadal! Feliz Navidad! Merry Christmas! Joyeux NÃ¶el! Buon Natale! Frohe Weihnachten! Mutlu Noeller!

item.title: Merry Christmas
item.description: Two context-free grammars for a Merry Christmas. Rendered with Context Free
